document_title: Endocrine melasma: Causes, symptoms, diagnosis and prevention
subsection_name: nam-noi-tiet.json_4_How to diagnose melasma caused by hormones
subsection_content:
When melasma appears on the skin, patients should see an endocrinologist for instructions on how to balance hormones through diet, appropriate medication use, and in conjunction with a dermatologist and endocrinologist. Excision to examine, carefully observe skin condition, find the cause of melasma to diagnose melasma caused by hormones or melasma caused by sun.
The doctor will use additional dermatoscopy equipment or a dermatoscope with integrated skin analysis software to determine the depth of melasma. If the case is difficult to distinguish from other skin diseases, the doctor will do some more in-depth tests to determine the cause of melasma for appropriate treatment.
Patients should have their skin examined to analyze the level of melasma and skin condition to apply appropriate treatment methods.
